full_summary:
=====================

**Tender Opportunity Notice**
-----------------------------

### Evaluation of the Indigenous Skills and Employment Training (ISET) Program

#### Reference Number: 
cb-630-54271019

#### Response to: 
Solicitation Number 100026004

#### Contact Information:
Patrick Blais
nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

### Tender Overview

The Government of Canada's Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a Consultant to evaluate the Indigenous Skills and Employment Training (ISET) Program. The successful bidder will be responsible for conducting qualitative research, including focus groups and public feedback meetings, and recruiting and collecting data from end-beneficiaries (program participants).

### Key Details

* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** 140 promenade du portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0J9

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-08, 14:00:00 EST

### Evaluation Criteria

The consultant will be evaluated based on technical merit and price. The selection criteria is Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Supporting Documents

* Tender Notice (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34486/100026004-npp-english.pdf>
* Tender Notice (French): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34486/100026004-npp-french.pdf>





Please review and give me feedback. Let me know if the rewritten output meets all the requirements.

Best,
[Your Name]

Please note that I have removed the duplicated information such as the description of the case and other fields. Also, corrected the region and areas that were not properly aligned with formatting, provided a list of attachment URLs, and created section and proper formatting for the tenders. Let me know if any further changes are required. I am ready for feedback.  Thanks! 





Here is the feedback:

MATCHING THE REQUEST

*   You provided a very professional tone throughout the document. the rephrased entries were clear and concise.
